In case you are using cache extensions in your site or joomla cache itself, clear them first.

field.name: loadtype
field.label: Load Type:
field.description: Auto means regular, Lazy for lazy load on scroll and for Eager the browser shall decide

field.name: exclude
field.label: Exclude:
field.description: There might be images with special class or id that you would not like to be lazy loaded, eager loaded and etc, in a SPACE separated list include them, ONLY ADD THE CLASS WITHOUT . AND ID WITHOUT #

field.name: allowed_pages
field.label: Allowed Pages:
field.description: Leave it empty if you would like all pages of your site to be under effect of this plugin or (any words in the url separated by | character), use \/$ for index , E.g. \/$|blog|products
